title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression for row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' or just returning a null result set, incorrect data set results are returned.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to ' and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: The developer said that 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data is fetched and can't be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '. 
2. Click on the Preview tab. 

Expected result: The first result record should not be returned when previewing the data set.
